properties.name: Dashe Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Winebars55 4th Street Oakland, CaDASHE CELLARS Family-owned winery and tasting room in downtown Oakland. Phone: (510) 452-1800 Hours: Thursday - Monday 12pm - 6pm

properties.name: Farmstead Cheese and Wine
properties.description: Posted by Winebars1650 Park Street, Alameda, CAFARMSTEAD CHEESE AND WINE "More than 600 boutique, hard to find, and value priced domestic and imported wines" in Alameda. Also offers a wide selection of domestic and imported cheeses. Phone 510-864-WINE (9463) Hours Monday–Saturday 10:00am–8:00pm Sunday 10:00AM–7:00PM

properties.name: Franklin Square Wine Bar
properties.description: Posted by Winebars2212 Broadway, Oakland, CAFRANKLIN SQUARE WINE BAR 2212 Broadway, Oakland Phone 510 251-0100 HOURS Monday- Friday 11:30 am - 10:00 pm Saturday 5:30 pm - 10:00 p.m. Sundays Closed This small but bright wine bar and eatery changes it\'s flights and wine selections every few days. properties.name: Kermit Lynch Wine Merchant
properties.description: Posted by Winebars1605 San Pablo, Berkeley, CA KERMIT LYNCH WINE MERCHANT Expert tasters and newbies alike love this neighborhood wine shop. Kermit Lynch specializes in French wines with a smaller selection of other imports. Phone: 510.524.1524 Hours: Tuesday-Saturday 11am-6pm

properties.name: Oddlots Wine Shop
properties.description: Posted by Winebars 1025 San Pablo Albany, CAODDLOTS WINE SHOP A bargain wine shop -- almost every bottle (mostly imports) is under 0. Phone 510 526-0522 Hours Monday-Friday 11am- 6pm Saturday 10-5 Sunday Closed

properties.name: Paul Marcus Wines
properties.description: Posted by Winebars5655 College Avenue Oakland, CAPAUL MARCUS WINES A "friendly, sophisticated neighborhood" wine shop in Oakland\'s Rockridge neighborhood. European and domestic wines. Hours: Monday-Friday 10 am -8pm Saturday 10am -7pm Sunday (most of the year)10am -7pm Sunday (during the winter)10am -6pm

properties.name: Solano Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Winebars1580 Solano Avenue, Albany, CASOLANO CELLARS 1580 Solano Avenue, Berkeley Phone 510.525-WINE (9463) This cozy, unpretentious wine bar sits right above a very approachable wine shop. Customers dress casually when coming in for a glass of Syrah, or for one of the bar\'s very popular tasting parties. HOURS Monday 11am — 7pm Tuesday — Saturday 11am — 9pm Sunday 12pm — 6pm Click below to hear what a manager has to say. Leave comments about your visit to Solano Cellars below

properties.name: The Wine Mine
properties.description: Posted by Winebars5427 Telegraph Avenue Oakland, CATHE WINE MINE A "premium wine warehouse" in Oakland\'s Temescal District. Saturday tastings for . PHONE 510 547-9463 Hours: Monday: closed Tue – Fri: 11:00 – 6:30pm Saturday: 11:00 – 6:00pm Sunday: 11:00 – 4:00pm

properties.name: Vine
properties.description: Posted by Winebars3343 Lakeshore Avenue, Oakland, CAVINE 3344 Lakeshore Avenue, Oakland Phone 510 444-VINE(8463) HOURS Monday - Closed Tuesday-Thursday 5 pm -11 pm Friday-Saturday 5 pm -1am Sunday 5 pm -10pm Vine offers wine from California vineyards that produce less than 1,000 cases each year. Wine is available from the bar or from wine tasting machines. The spacious building has a large bar, bench seating and a cozy, lounge-like upstairs area for private parties and bottle service. properties.name: Vintage Berkeley
properties.description: Posted by Winebars2113 Vine Street, Berkeley, CAVINTAGE BERKELEY "A wine store for the people." This is Solano Cellars\' sister shop in North Berkeley. Phone (510) 665-8600 Hours: Monday-Saturday 11am-8pm Sunday 12-6pm

properties.name: Zza
properties.description: Posted by Winebars 550 Grand Avenue, Oakland, CAZZA\'S ENOTECA 550 Grand Avenue, Oakland Phone 510 839-9124/font> Hours Sunday - Tuesday 5pm - 10pm Wednesday - Thursday 5pm - 11pm Friday - Saturday 5pm - 12am Zza\'s Enoteca is a cozy, hip wine spot adjoined to Zza\'s pizzeria. You can listen to smooth jazz while trying wines from smaller wineries. There are also mini pizzas and other small plates and free olives and nuts to snack on. Prices range from .50 to 3 per glass. All bottles are also for sale for 30 percent off. Click below to hear what a customer has to say. Click below to hear what a manager has to say. Leave comments about your visit to Zza\'s below
